tool.name: daa2rma
tool.description: Compute a MEGAN rma6 file from a DIAMOND daa file
tool.help:
Compute a MEGAN RMA6 file from a DIAMOND DAA file
**Input**
- DAA file - metadata mapping file (as defined in http://qiime.org/documentation/file_formats.html - BIOM 1 format (see http://biom-format.org/documentation/format-versions/biom-1.0.html
**Output**
- RMA6 file
